payload.text:
To initiate an asset transfer if you hold an individual HIN:
1. Select 'Go to page'.
2. In the 'Transfers' section, select the relevant 'Australian Standard Transfer' option, then follow the prompts

To initiate an asset transfer if you do not hold an individual HIN:
1. Select 'Go to page'.
2. In the 'Transfers' section, select 'Offline asset transfer - Investments' then follow the prompts
